title: JamesBorn
author: JamesBorn
content: Societies that occupied chronic drugs addicts, chain smokers, high way robbers, prostitutions, kidnappers, cultism, bloody leaders, and witchcrafts practices is vulnerable to threats and unhealthy society. Some communities has no peace around their environment because they're people who have decided to create tends atmosphere. You can not move freely because you're sore afraid of another persons posting as threats to their lives.  Any society that do not practice harmony and coherent society tends to destroy lives of its members and when lives is negatively affected it becomes a threats to the society. We should leader to maintain healthy society by been clean to yourself and your community. Let's avoid bad habits and drugs to build possible society for the future.

The most terrible part of the story is that they were heavily protected by the police before this ugly incident. And his son was recently murdered by the police. There are reports that these killing were orchestrated by the Hindus because they have the full support of the government.  The killing of some youths that were in a birthday party in the US is an indication that the world is becoming unsafe everyday. For me, I ensure that my family take every security measure to limit attack of these criminals. We don't keep late night, we live a modest life, keep a dog that serves as an alarm if there is any stranger in our compound, avoid areas with high crime rate, avoid large gathering etc.           QuoteAny society that do not practice harmony and coherent society tends to destroy lives of its members and when lives is negatively affected it becomes a threats to the society. Tribalism, religious fanaticism, racism, greed, materialism and uncontrollable quest for political power plays key roles in the high crime rate we are experiencing in our society. Let us treat our fellow countrymen the way we want them to treat us and we will all live a peaceful and prosperous society.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.body: It is a pity that these social vices are destroying the society bit by bit and nothing can be done about it. Government contribute more to ignite these social vices due to their greed and desperate for power. The young ones are watching what is happening and they think it is the right thing to do and might definitely be influenced by their environments. The leaders in my country are doing more harm to the citizens than good,especially the youths. There is high rate of unemployment in the country, which has made the lazy youths see prostitution,robbery and kidnapping as the only option to carter for themselves. It takes the grace of God for one to grow up in a society with all these vices without involving in them. A good moral and God fearing life is the best way to overcome these vices. Loving one another regardless of the skin color, tribe and religion is the only way out to a peaceful society.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: It is also important to keep in mind that the western democracies take much emphasis on the freedom of their citizens, specially in the United States.So where you would draw the line to fix the difference between personal right and social vice.In conservative Islamic and Christian societies alcohol would be viewed as a vice, so would be prostitution, smoking or even asking for interest on loans. It depends whom you ask.That is where the struggle between faction of society come from, because what some could consider to be a vice or a sin, to other it is just freedom and a personal choice.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: Social evil always exists in every society. And that crime is indeed difficult to erase because it cannot be erased. Many factors cause crime, for example poverty, unemployment, juvenile delinquency, self-defense, cults, conflict and competition. But it could be that this can be overcome by enforcing strict legal sanctions, maintaining the preservation and continuity of values ​​and norms in society.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: We live in communities with lots & lots of other people. We can not control the actions of others, all we can do is live a clean, healthy life ourselves. There are many temptations around, vices etc. It can be hard to ignore them all & follow the right path. Added motivations can help you to do the right thing though, if you have a family you should think of them if you are tempted to misbehave.

comments.body: But if you have no option where you're living then you have to decide to leave and go somewhere else that you think is the right place for you to keep on living.These social vices are contagious. comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Qiubell5 on April 23, 2023, 07:19:47 AMSocial evil always exists in every society. And that crime is indeed difficult to erase because it cannot be erased. Many factors cause crime, for example poverty, unemployment, juvenile delinquency, self-defense, cults, conflict and competition. But it could be that this can be overcome by enforcing strict legal sanctions, maintaining the preservation and continuity of values ​​and norms in society.Strict sanctions cannot stop crimes that are triggered by poverty and unemployment. The only way to curb these crimes is through economic prosperity and the provision of employment opportunities. Like in my country crime increased as our economy nosedived. Before in my country, you can leave your doors open and sleep at night. Currently, because of the high rate of unemployment, you need to fence your house and put iron bars on the windows and doors for protection against criminals. The crimes that we see in the developed world such as mass shootings, suicide, and drug addiction are the result of lack of gun control, violent social media, and the collapse of social systems such as the family coupled with societal and peer influence. These crimes can be curtailed by government policies, positive value orientation, and education.
